interpretation: The "cloud with rain" card is a reminder that even amidst difficult times, there is always hope for growth and renewal. Just as rain nourishes the earth, this card symbolizes the cleansing and purifying power of emotions and the potential for new beginnings. It encourages us to embrace our emotions and allow them to flow freely, knowing that this process can lead to healing and transformation. This card can also suggest a need to seek comfort and support during challenging times, as well as a call to remain patient and trust that better days are ahead.
